entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 7:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: NW 47 km/h gust 64 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm south of Plum Point. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
